concept-wr.title: Alarm Generation and Reporting
concept-wr.shortdesc: Titanium Server provides facilities for alarm and log management.

conbody.p: Support is included for the following:

li.p: alarms on performance management thresholds and cloud-level services and equipment

conbody.draft-comment: Updated x-ref to add title and point to current topic. You could consider making this a reference to "Fault Management" which seems to be a higher level starting point for this topic. (I left it with "Alarm Message" because that topic includes a reference to "Fault Management" but "Fault Management" does not include a reference back to "Alarm Messages".)
conbody.p: As part of alarm management, Titanium Server also provides support for alarm suppression.
For more information, see Titanium Server System Administration: .
